label: TradeTax
comment: A trade related fiscal levy or duty.

datatypeProperties.comment: A category name, expressed as text, of this trade related tax, levy or duty.
The code specifying a type of due date for this trade tax.
A monetary value of the refund of this trade related tax, levy or duty.

referencedBy.comment: A tax that is applied to this logistics service charge.
